thread.title: Ashlee Simpson is an ambitious mother!
thread.title_full: Ashlee Simpson is an ambitious mother!

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Ashlee Simpson is an ambitious mother!
text:
Ashlee Simpson is an ambitious mother! By Indo-Asian News Service on October 25, 2015 at 3:20 AM Comments 
Singer Ashlee Simpson thinks her six-year-old son Bronx will carve out a career in the music industry in the future because he already “writes little songs”. “He’s so into music. He loves to dance around and he writes little songs. They’re good! It’s so cute,” Simpson told people.com. 
Bronx is gearing up to celebrate his seventh birthday next month and Simpson’s husband Evan Ross, 27, thinks they should get him the new video game “Guitar Hero Live” so he can continue practicing. “He’s super into video games and this one is perfect for him,” she said. 
  25, 2015 3:10 AM Topics:
